data.title: Mom's code
data.statement:
My mom is convinced she is being hunted by the FBI, thus she uses a code when she sends me messages.
She told me to use this conversion table :

`a -> c         A -> C
b -> d         B -> D
c -> e         C -> E
.    .         .    .
.    .         .    .
x -> z         X -> Z
y -> a         Y -> A
z -> b         Z -> B`

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

My mom is convinced she is being hunted by the FBI, thus she uses a code when she sends me messages.
She told me to use this conversion table :

a -> c         A -> C
b -> d         B -> D
c -> e         C -> E
.    .         .    .
.    .         .    .
x -> z         X -> Z
y -> a         Y -> A
z -> b         Z -> B
Input
Line 1: The coded message
Output
Line 1: The decoded message
Constraints
Example
Input
abc
Output
cde
